comments.body: wouldn't this only return the "aspect" subpart of MyModel, typically?

Yes, that would probably work well. Although in the interest of keeping this example as simple as possible it might be worth leaving that out.

Once we've accumulated some experience using this class beyond tests, this example should merit a revision.

currently the code above is not analyzed, because it's not in a "## Sample code" section. Dunno if you are concerned about that or not. (The advantage of having it in such a section is it'll get updated when we do things like introduce new lints, e.g. the upcoming "remove new" lint.)
